input.sentences: bike riding in the cold is something i enjoy doing .
you can a mix of cold from the weather with heat from your body movements .
i love to compete also . this was my first race and i had practiced for this for a long time .
it was a great experience and i hope to do it again .
next time i 'll practice a little harder and be a little better .
output.sentences: I have friend who love riding his bike, especially he enjoy it more in the cold.
As the weather became colder, his movements became mix of excitement.
This time in the race he practiced a lot to win.
I hope can experience more of his hard work.
As time comes to the end, he lost and he just want topractice more and harder.
